name: Mercedes-Benz G-Class
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz G-Class, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 2.55  - 4.00 Crore. It is available in 3 variants, with engine options ranging from 2925 to 3982 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. G-Class has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 9 airbags. Mercedes-Benz G-Class has a ground clearance of 241 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 0 kmpl for G-Class.
